scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of "Report of the Staff Working Groups on Organizing and Collective Bargaining the AFL-CIO Committee on the Evolution of Work" May 18, 1993, and other selected Documents of Work and Labor Law Reform, 1993.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: AFL-CIO Documents of Work and Labor Law Reform #6080m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
